projects: [{"title":"The COVID-19 outbreak: Social media sentiment analysis of public reactions with multi-dimensional perspective","start_date":"May 2020","end_date":"Jun 2020","description":"- Worked on Behavioral analysis of impact of epidemiological measures taken due to COVID 19, on human sentiment- Analyzed trending tweets across regions severely impacted by COVID-19 outbreak- Visualized the sentiments of general public through use of basics of natural language processing and python programming."}]
